review: The Fire Stick is a slick little device and worked great once the software update was complete.  But like other people who complained online, I had problems getting it to update it's software the first several times I tried to set it up.  It would stop updating about 75% of the way through the process.  I did an online search and one user mentioned installing the Fire Stick in HDMI1.  I tried that and it finished the update quickly.  I don't know why that solved the problem but it did.  Other than that, I have been happy with the performance and I really like the remote that comes with it.

review: Pleasantly surprised!! I have had a chromecast for nearly a year now and it has survey its purpose but this is so much cleaner. The menu system is really user friendly the remote is actually very useful. The only complaint I have is the need for the usb to be connected to a power outlet and not just the USB connection on my TV. I enjoy the apps that are available I would recommend this item to anyone.
